projects.title: 404 Page Challenge
projects.description: Simple 404 page project using responsively moving svgs to replicate an image based background in the orginal.

projects.title: Announcement Card with SVG blob
projects.description: A simple project replicating the look of announcement card.

projects.title: Apps Card Challenge
projects.description: A simple project replicating the look of an apps component.

projects.title: Colored Cards Challenge
projects.description: Simple set of cards, that generate a set of random pastel colors on click. Responsive flexbox.

projects.title: Social Media Get in Touch Card
projects.description: Simple card with social media links that is able to switch between dark/light modes and stores preference in localstorage.

projects.title: Timer App
projects.description: Simple web app replicating functionality of Android timer application. Custom styling.

projects.title: Expanding User Profile Card
projects.description: Simple component with user profile links. Expanding to reveal details.

projects.title: Pricing Cards
projects.description: Simple pricing plan cards from the challenge, spiced up with responsiveness, dark and light mode and some css effects.

projects.title: Calculator
projects.description: Simple calculator based on a tutorial, with custom changes and a few fixes. Made to practice OOP style js code.

projects.title: File Uploader
projects.description: File uploading component in pure js, that emulates upload with animations based off selected file size.
